enWisdom: Death is preferable to the shame of disgrace
Having less is all right, but being humiliated, never!
Abandonment is a support for ignorance

Wisdom: رَضِيَ بِالذُّلِّ مَنْ كَشَفَ ضُرَّهُ لِغَيْرِهِ
enWisdom: One who reveals his distress to others has accepted humiliation

Wisdom: مَنْ تَذَلَّلَ لِأَبْنَاءِ الدُّنْيَا تَعَرَّى مِنْ لِبَاسِ التَّقْوَى
enWisdom: Whoever takes off the attire of God-wariness will not be able to cover himself with anything from the devices (and means) of this world

Wisdom: مَنْ هَانَتْ عَلَيْهِ نَفْسُهُ فَلَا تَرْجُ خَيْرَهُ
enWisdom: When one takes himself to be lowly, [then] do not expect [or hope] for any good from him
